cc.mallet.grmm.test

类 TestInference

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestCase
      • cc.mallet.grmm.test.TestInference

  • public class TestInference
extends TestCase
    Torture tests of inference in GRMM. Well, actually, they're not all that torturous, but hopefully they're at least somewhat disconcerting.
